    Face3.scale(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.
    Face3
    Face3.scale(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.

    Beware, non-uniform scaling requires that normals be recalculated for correct shading.
    Face3
    Face3.scaleGlobal(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3
    Face3.scaleGlobal(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3
    Face3.scaleLocal(float scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.
    Face3
    Face3.scaleLocal(Vec3 scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.

    Method
    Description
    Iterator<Face3>
    Mesh3.iterator()
    Returns an iterator for this mesh, which allows its faces to be accessed in an enhanced for-loop.

    Method
    Description
    static Vec3
    Face3.centerMean(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the center of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.

    Compares this face to another by hash code.
    static Vec3
    Face3.eval(Face3 face, float step, Vec3 target)
    Finds a point on the face's perimeter given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .

    Curve3.fromMeshFace(Face3 face, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve from a face in a mesh.
    Face3
    Mesh3.getFace(int index, Face3 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    static Vec3
    Face3.normal(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the normal of a face by averaging all the normals in its list of vertices, then normalizing the average.
    static Quaternion
    Face3.orientation(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the face as a quaternion based on the face's normal.
    static Transform3
    Face3.orientation(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the face as a transform based on the face's normal.
    static Ray3
    Face3.orientation(Face3 face, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the face as a ray based on the face's normal.
    static float
    Face3.perimeter(Face3 face)
    Calculates the perimeter of a face by summing the Euclidean distance between vertices.
    static Vec3[]
    Face3.sharedCoords(Face3 a, Face3 b)
    Finds the shared coordinates, if any, between two faces.
